description: From undeniable +‎ -ly, equivalent to un- +‎ deny +‎ -ably.

adverbs.description: undeniably (comparative more undeniably, superlative most undeniably)

entries.meaning: In an undeniable manner, or to an undeniable extent.
Used as a modal adverb to assert that that the indicated statement is undeniable.
examples: The third movie was undeniably the best.
